about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who We Are
about.content:
Our Vision

Every Nation Indonesia is a church that exists to honor God by establishing Christ-centered, Spirit-empowered, socially responsible churches and campus ministries in every nation.

Our Mission

We are committed to discipleship, leadership development, and world missions. We believe in the importance of reaching the next generation through our campus ministries.

items.title: Sunday Service
items.description: Join us every Sunday at 10:00 AM for our main worship service. Experience powerful worship, relevant teaching, and a welcoming community.

items.title: Youth Service
items.description: Our youth service is designed specifically for teenagers and young adults. Join us every Friday at 7:00 PM for an exciting time of worship and fellowship.

items.title: Prayer Meeting
items.description: We believe in the power of prayer. Join us every Wednesday at 7:00 PM as we come together to pray for our church, city, and nation.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Join Us at Our Next Event

items.title: Leadership Conference
items.description: A three-day conference designed to equip and empower leaders in the church and marketplace.

items.title: Worship Night
items.description: An evening of worship and prayer as we come together to seek God's presence and direction.

items.title: Community Outreach
items.description: Join us as we serve our local community through various outreach initiatives and programs.

connect.title: Connect With Us
connect.subtitle: Find Your Place in Our Community

options.title: Join a Life Group
options.description: Life Groups are the heart of our church community. Join a group to grow in your faith and build meaningful relationships.

options.title: Serve with Us
options.description: We believe that everyone has a role to play in the church. Discover your gifts and serve with us in various ministries.

options.title: New to Church?
options.description: If you're new to our church or to faith, we'd love to connect with you and help you take your next steps.

giving.title: Giving
giving.subtitle: Partner with Us in Ministry
giving.content: Your generous giving helps us continue our mission of transforming lives through Christ. We appreciate your support as we work together to make a difference in our community and beyond.
